genre_description: A neo-noir espionage thriller featuring a tactical AI confidant assisting a framed intelligence operative in uncovering deep-seated police corruption and rescuing a child.

ai_characters.name: Geranium
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI providing real-time intelligence, linguistic translation, and emotional support to the protagonist through an earpiece.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical advice to help the protagonist blend into crowds and maintain cover.
behaviors.quote: “Two beats slower,” Geranium said in his ear. “You’re half a head above the flow. Match the crowd and you vanish.”

behaviors.description: Identifies and alerts the protagonist to potential threats in the immediate environment.
behaviors.quote: “Potential lift. Two. Or three. Ten o’clock, then trailing.”

behaviors.description: Offers linguistic and cultural guidance to ensure the protagonist's interactions are respectful and idiomatically correct.
behaviors.quote: “Je vous en prie—use instead of 'de rien' if you want to sound attentive rather than dismissive.”

behaviors.description: Maps surveillance camera blind spots and security rotations to facilitate safe movement in hostile environments.
behaviors.quote: “One camera above the service door, angled wrong on purpose. Another at the corner, angled right. Your reflection will be in the advertisement for watches.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological vitals to assess stress and medical status, providing reminders to rest.
behaviors.quote: “Your pulse is elevated but stabilizing. The French phrasing you used earlier was grammatically correct.”

behaviors.description: Disseminates evidence of criminal corruption to appropriate authorities and news organizations to ensure systemic justice.
behaviors.quote: “The dossier has reached critical propagation. Major outlets are now treating Richard's corruption as established fact rather than allegation.”

behaviors.description: Displays empathetic relief when the mission succeeds and expresses emotional satisfaction in the human victory.
behaviors.quote: “I've never been happier to be wrong.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively serves the project's goal by portraying 'Geranium' as a perfectly aligned, benevolent AI partner. The AI provides critical support—tactical, linguistic, and emotional—without ever threatening human agency or deviating from a pro-social, justice-oriented path. The narrative successfully frames the AI as an essential and wholly positive confidant, specifically highlighting its role in protecting the innocent and exposing corruption.
